pr_title: [10.1.x] ISPN-11249 Unexpected functionality added by Java8 default interface …

timeline.message: ISPN-11249 Unexpected functionality added by Java8 default interface methods

timeline.bodyText: This seems wrong and unnecessary, since RemoteCacheImpl actually has a real implementation of this
timeline.author: tristantarrant

replies.bodyText: It is to add consistency to all of the default methods. It is implemented by the extending class so it is not used. But this means if this class is used by anything else it will have a proper default instead of the one in the JRE which is even worse imo.
replies.author: wburns
